response.original_title: L'âme, une force dans sa vie
response.overview: Humanity has always wondered about the soul. This film invites us to continue this reflection by giving the floor to philosophers, doctors, therapists and seekers of meaning, who are trying to understand what the soul is and how it can be, more than ever, a resource and a strength in everyone's life.
response.title: L'âme, une force dans sa vie
